thread.section_title: Brilliance.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brilliance.com | www.brilliance.com
thread.title: Susan Bailey

author: Susan Bailey
title: Susan Bailey
text: I was in the market for a new diamond to upgrade my old set. It was my 30 year anniversary and the only thing I wanted for my anniversary was a larger diamond to replace the one in my current set. Erin Winchell guided me through the process and helped me pick out the best diamond for our budget. I chose to send my set into Brilliance to have them set my new diamond and I was so happy with the results! My set of 30 years looked like a brand new set after the new diamond was put in and the rings were cleaned and polished. I highly recommend using Brilliance.
